name: Aetherflame Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
Aetherflame Wall can block creatures with shadow as though they didn't have shadow.
{R}: Aetherflame Wall gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Aether Web
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1, has reach, and can block creatures with shadow as though they didn't have shadow. (Creatures with reach can block creatures with flying.)

name: Amrou Scout
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The people of Amrou were scattered by war and driven into hiding. Scouts maintain the beacon fires that signal "return" and "home."

name: Amrou Seekers
oracle_text: Amrou Seekers can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.
flavor_text: The paradise of Amrou Haven had become a field of cinders. Its people struggled to survive, hoping to see visions of its past in the strange storms that quickly passed.

name: Ancient Grudge
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: The time rifts remind Yavimaya of the enemies of its past and provide fresh fuel for its fires.

name: Ashcoat Bear
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
flavor_text: The bears wade into time rifts to feed. They do not fear the storms, and they are quick enough to snatch prey just as it blinks in or out of time.

name: Assassinate
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: The rulers of old Dominaria kept assassins on retainer. However, the true loyalty of these master killers was always to their peers. This elite brotherhood survived the fall of the old royal order.

name: Basal Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "Sacrifice this permanent: Add {B}{B}."
flavor_text:
"Fascinating . . . These creatures display the paradox of tenacity and purposed self-destruction I have sought to breed into my thrulls."
—Endrek Sahr, master breeder

name: Benalish Cavalry
oracle_text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "My people swore to protect Benalia to the end. It is battered, but yet stands, as do we."

name: Bewilder
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Teferi snapped his fingers, and the viashino started clucking like a chicken. Silly, yes, but exactly the thing we needed to break the stifling tension."
—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Blazing Blade Askari
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{2}: Blazing Blade Askari becomes colorless until end of turn.
flavor_text: "This can't be Jamuraa. We could not have failed her this badly . . . ."

name: Bogardan Rager
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

name: Bonesplitter Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +2/+0.
flavor_text: As the time streams grew more and more unstable, Dominaria's creatures struggled to adapt. The intense pressures led to many dead ends but also to lethal new forms that appeared as suddenly as the ashen rains.

name: Brass Gnat
oracle_text:
Flying
Brass Gnat doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, untap Brass Gnat.
flavor_text: Its buzzing is the sound of its inner mechanisms, ever winding down.

name: Call to the Netherworld
oracle_text:
Return target black creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: The ritual was normally performed only by horrors and pit spawn. Lesser mages had but one sanity to crack in the casting.

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: Fendros gasped as he watched the spell drip from the ends of his fingers. He moved his foot, afraid to disturb the spot where it lay slain.

name: Castle Raptors
oracle_text:
Flying
As long as Castle Raptors is untapped, it gets +0/+2.
flavor_text: "Each place we see is as ruined and lifeless as the last. So here we stay, because this ruin is *ours*."

name: Chameleon Blur
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that creatures would deal to players this turn.
flavor_text:
"Sometimes the best plan is neither fighting nor running."
—Freyalise

name: Children of Korlis
oracle_text: Sacrifice Children of Korlis: You gain life equal to the life you've lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor_text:
"We have a proud history of self-sacrifice. But it is easy, in these bleak times, to find one among us who is eager to die for any cause."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Chromatic Star
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color.
When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"This item is not from . . . now. It reflects a sky no longer ours and gleams with hope that does not exist."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Coal Stoker

—Dobruk the Unstable, pyromancer

{T}: D'Avenant Healer deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

Enchant creature

name: Dream Stalker

Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

oracle_text: {T}: Tap target creature with toughness 2 or less.

Flying

name: Goblin Skycutter

Target creature without flying can't block this turn.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

name: Havenwood Wurm
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Vigilance

oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

—Rukarumel, field journal

name: Urborg Syphon-Mage
oracle_text: {2}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each other player loses 2 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor_text: "I have become a gourmet of sorts. Each soul has its own distinctive flavor. The art is in inviting the right company to the feast."

name: Venser's Sliver
flavor_text: Venser admired his handiwork and smiled. His first prototype had joined with the hive mind all too well, running with the brood and becoming a predator itself. This one, he thought, would be accepted into the hive but still obey his commands.
